title: Accessibility
description: Facilities for disabled passengers include ramps, adapted drinking fountains, showers and dedicated toilets. Lowered telephones, text telephones and telephones fitted with induction loops are also available. Wheelchairs are available from the Tourism NSW desk. Disabled parking spaces are located at the front of Terminal 1 for valid badge holders. Any passengers who may require additional assistance are advised to contact their airline before travelling.

title: Accessibility
description: Facilities for disabled passengers include ramps, adapted drinking fountains, showers and dedicated toilets. Lowered telephones, text telephones and telephones fitted with induction loops are also available. Wheelchairs are available from the Tourism NSW desk. title: Air New Zealand Lounge
description: Near gate 59.

title: American Express & Delta Lounges
description: Near gate 24 and is accessible to those with select AMEX cards.

title: Australian Way
description:
Offering a unique shopping experience in a relaxed, spacious and authentically Australian environment, the true essence of Australia can be found at Australian Way.
Australian Way's souvenirs and gifts include authentic handcrafted Aboriginal products, soft Australian plush, an extensive range of apparel, jewellery, travel accessories and a range of great gifts for kids.
With a focus on quality Australian Made products, Australian Way is the perfect place to pick up a little piece of Australia.
Hours: 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM

title: Baggage Claim
description: Smartecarte operates luggage storage services in Terminals 1 and 2. Enquiries about lost items should be made to Sydney Airport Corporation Lost Property in Terminal 1 and 2 (tel: +61 2 9667 9111) or Qantas for luggage misplaced in Terminal 3 (tel: +61 2 9952 9312). Baggage trolleys are available throughout the airport.

title: Baggage Claim
description: Smartecarte operates luggage storage services in Terminals 1 and 2. Enquiries about lost items should be made to Sydney Airport Corporation Lost Property in Terminal 1 and 2 (tel: +61 2 9667 9111) or Qantas for luggage misplaced in Terminal 3 (tel: +61 2 9952 9312). Baggage trolleys are available throughout the airport.

Baggage trolleys are available throughout the airport.

title: Bank/ATM
description: ATMs are located in all terminals. Full banking services are available from ANZ Bank in Terminal 1. Currency exchange facilities are located in Terminals 1 and 2.

title: Bank/ATM
description: ATMs are located in all terminals. Full banking services are available from ANZ Bank in Terminal 1. Currency exchange facilities are located in Terminals 1 and 2.

title: Bank/ATM
description: ATMs are located in all terminals. Full banking services are available from ANZ Bank in Terminal 1. Currency exchange facilities are located in Terminals 1 and 2.

title: Bijoux Collection
description:
Bijoux Collection offers a stylish range of designer jewellery, watches and gifts. Featuring high quality products and reputable designer brands from around the world, Bijoux Collection strives to provide a modern style statement with their range of contemporary and sophisticated accessories for men and women.
Hours: 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM

title: Boost Juice
description:
Refuel with the right stuff. Get healthy fruit juices and delicious nutritious low-fat yoghurt smoothies from the Boost Juice Bar.
Hours: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM, Daily

title: Burberry
description:
The Burberry store located at T1 International Terminal at Sydney Airport carries a full range of men's and women's ready-to-wear from the Burberry London collection as well as accessories including bags, shoes, fragrance, timepiece and sunglass lines.
Established in 1856, Burberry is a global British luxury brand with a heritage of innovation, craftsmanship and design. Digital luxury positioning and the optimization across innovative mediums of the trench coat, trademark check and Equestrian Knight Device heritage icons, make the brand purer, more compelling and more relevant globally, across genders and generations. Hours: 6:00 AM - 9:30 PM

title: Coopers Alehouse
description:
Opposite gate 40. Coopers has partnered with Emirates Leisure Retail Australia to bring the second Coopers Ale House airport concept to life at Sydney Domestic Airport T2. The only place you can get live sports and entertainment. Coopers, 100% Australian owned. Enjoy a drink with us today!
Hours: 5:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Daily

title: Emirates Lounge
description: Located after Customs near gate 58.

title: Etihad First and Business Class Lounge
description: Near gate 50.

title: Heinemann Tax & Duty Free
description:
Heinemann Tax & Duty Free gives international travellers the choice of the best international luxury brands including:
Liquor: Johnnie Walker, Hennessy, Bombay
Champagne & Wine: Penfolds, Veuve Cliquot, Jacobs Creek
Confectionary: Toblerone, Lindt, Godiva
Fragrance & Cosmetics: Chanel, Dior, Esteè Lauder
Sunglasses: Ray Ban, Oakley, Tag Heuer, Longine
Regionals: Ocean King, Australian by Nature.
Hours: 5:00 AM - 10:00 PM

title: Hinata
description: On the way to gate 24. (Hinata) meaning Sunny Place, will offer customers a truly Japanese dining experience. All sushi & sashimi products are made to order in front of customers, using only the finest quality seafood sourced from Australian waters.

title: Holiday Inn Sydney Airport
description:
Holiday Inn Sydney Airport
tel: +61 2 9330 0600
www.ihg.com
The Holiday Inn Sydney Airport is a good mid-range option for those seeking easy access to the airport with its shuttle bus service to/from the terminals and 'Park, Stay and Go' parking facility. Among the hotel's on-site facilities are a 24-hour business centre, fitness room, restaurant and bar.

title: McDonald's
description:
Enjoy our famous burgers and tasty salads. McDonald's outlets are located both before and after Customs at International Terminal (T1) and after Security at Domestic Terminal (T2).
Hours: 4:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Daily

title: Medical Services
description: The Sydney Airport Medical Centre at International Terminal (T1) is located on level 3.

title: Mimco
description: Mimco designs unique accessories collections.  We dream, explore & play with whatever gives us delight in the moment.  Our woman loves to dress up, she loves to explore & she knows the value a killer accessory makes to her look of the day.  Mimco invites you to explore, interact, follow your intuition and be yourself. Hours: 6:00 AM - 9:00 PM

title: Parking
description: Sydney Airport has three parking lots. The International Car Park is located opposite Terminal 1 and offers short- and long-term rates. The multistory Domestic At Terminal Car Park, which is directly linked to Terminals 2 and 3, provides short-stay options. The domestic long-term Blu Emu car park can be accessed via Ross Smith Avenue from General Holmes Drive or Sir Reginald Ansett Drive; regular courtesy shuttles connect this car park to the terminals. There is a designated pick-up area offering 10 minutes free parking at Terminal 2, while pre-bookable bays are available for those seeking to leave their vehicle to pick up or drop off passengers.

title: Parking
description: Sydney Airport has three parking lots. The International Car Park is located opposite Terminal 1 and offers short- and long-term rates. The multistory Domestic At Terminal Car Park, which is directly linked to Terminals 2 and 3, provides short-stay options. The domestic long-term Blu Emu car park can be accessed via Ross Smith Avenue from General Holmes Drive or Sir Reginald Ansett Drive; regular courtesy shuttles connect this car park to the terminals. There is a designated pick-up area offering 10 minutes free parking at Terminal 2, while pre-bookable bays are available for those seeking to leave their vehicle to pick up or drop off passengers.

title: Qantas Club Lounge
description: Lounge at International Terminal (T1) is located after Customs on the Mezzanine level. Access to the Qantas lounges is only for Qantas Club members, those members with appropriate status, or those travelling business or first class. Reciprocal benefits apply, but there is no paid admission or equivalent scheme.

title: Qantas Club Lounge
description: The Qantas lounge gets incredibly busy with business travelers. You can check-in in the lounge for domestic Qantas flights, but you have to check in in T2 at the Jetstar counters for Jetstar flights. Access to the Qantas lounges is only for Qantas Club members, those members with appropriate status, or those travelling business or first class. Reciprocal benefits apply, but there is no paid admission or equivalent scheme.

title: Rail
description: The Airport Link (tel:+61 2 8337 8417; www.airportlink.com.au) rail service connects the three terminals to Sydney Central Station (journey time: 29 minutes; fare: A$16.40) and city suburbs. Terminal 1 has its own railway station, while Terminals 2 and 3 share a station.

title: Rail
description: The Airport Link (tel:+61 2 8337 8417; www.airportlink.com.au) rail service connects the three terminals to Sydney Central Station (journey time: 29 minutes; fare: A$16.40) and city suburbs. Terminal 1 has its own railway station, while Terminals 2 and 3 share a station.

title: Regional Express Lounge
description: Near gate 47.

title: Rydges Sydney Airport Hotel
description:
Rydges Sydney Airport Hotel
tel: +61 2 9313 2500
www.rydges.com
The only hotel within a terminal at Sydney Airport, the Rydges is in the perfect position for access to the international terminal's facilities and services. But it has attractions of its own, such as a grill restaurant, meeting space and a sports bar.

title: Seafood Bar - Caviar House
description: Located the central lounge, it is a truly exotic outlet offering the discerning traveller the opportunity to spoil themselves. Sample plates of exotic Balik Salmon and Prunier Caviar delight customers along with the very best local oysters, prawns & other seafood offerings. A fine selection of Australian wines & beers are complemented by Seafood Bar - Caviar House & Prunierês own champagne and Balik Beer, or try one of the great flavoured Vodkas.

title: Singapore Airlines Lounge
description: Silver Kris Lounge located near gate 59.

title: SkyTeam Lounge
description: Plaza Premium managed lounge located in Terminal 1 near gate 24. Paid access is priced at $77 for two hours and $132 for five hours.

title: Stamford Plaza Sydney Airport Hotel
description:
Stamford Plaza Sydney Airport Hotel
tel: +61 2 9317 2200
www.stamford.com.au Boasting a rooftop swimming pool, sauna and gym facilities, Stamford Plaza Sydney Airport Hotel is located a short drive from Terminal 1, and is very close to Terminals 2 and 3. Business guests can make use of 11 function rooms, while on-site parking is also available.

title: Taxis and Public Transportation
description:
Bus: Sydney Buses (tel: +61 131 500; www.sydneybuses.info) operates bus 400 from Burwood to Bondi Junction, calling at Terminals 1 and 3. The journey time to central Sydney is roughly 35 minutes and the fare is A$12.60. The bus stops are located on the arrivals levels of these terminals.
Shuttle: Many shuttle bus companies provide a service between Sydney Airport and most city suburbs; these need to be booked in advance (see the airport website for full details). Many hotels can provide a transfer service for guests—most at an additional cost.
Taxi: Each terminal has its own taxi rank. Companies serving the airport include: Taxis Combined Services (tel: +61 133 300; www.taxiscombined.com.au), Silver Service Fleet (tel: +61 133 100; www.silverservice.com.au), Legion Cabs (tel: +61 131 271; www.legioncabs.com.au), Premier Cabs (tel: +61 131 017; www.premiercabs.com.au) and St George Cabs (tel: +61 132 166; www.stgeorgecabs.com.au). The journey time to the city centre is around 30 minutes, and the single fare starts at around A$45.

description:

title: Terrace Bar and Brasserie
description:
Located near Departures check-in C. The Terrace Bar has a large outdoor designated smoking area, the only smoking area available before and after Customs at Sydney International Airport. The Terrace Bar and Brasserie is a contemporary style classic pub with a subtle industrial design, featuring a light and airy terrace with botanical greenery and al fresco dining. The Terrace offers 12 beers on tap, up to 15 beers by the bottle and over 25 wines by the glass. The bar also incorporates an express coffee area with a small selection of snacks for those with time limitations.
The Terrace menu focuses on fresh, simple, quality produce sourced locally. Pub classics and old favourites form the backbone of the menu along with Asian influenced dishes and house made pizzas. The emphasis is on uncomplicated honest food with generous size portions.

title: The Coffee Club
description:
The Coffee Club Sydney International Airport invites you to come and enjoy a great café experience. Whether you're in the mood for breakfast, lunch or just a relaxing coffee to break up the day, there's no better place to sit and relax. The Coffee Club Sydney International Airport—Good Food, Great Service and Excellent Coffee.
Hours: 4:00 AM - 8:30 PM, Daily

title: Trattoria Prego
description: A traditional family style Italian eatery offering authentic pizzas, pastas, salads and a great gelato. Enjoy the atmosphere of watching the chefs at work while dining in or select from the take away cabinet if you are on your way to your gate. Trattoria Prego also serves great coffee and a fine selection of Italian and local wines and beers. Hours: 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Daily

title: Veloce Espresso
description:
Veloce Espresso brings you 'The Espresso Taste of Life' by using Schibello's Coffee Exclusive premium blend coffee. This is Schibello's flagship blend, using only the finest Arabica beans to create this supreme quality and flavour.
To go with this great coffee Veloce Espresso offers a wide range of fresh quality products to compliment your great coffee experience. We have a great selection of Italian biscottis, friands, slices, muffins, cookies, cakes and pastries.
We also offer a wide range of fresh gourmet wraps, focaccias and salads. Try our milkshakes or a blended coffee. We have a wide range of bottled drinks and juices. You can also purchase Schibello's great range of coffees in take home packs.
Hours: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM, Daily

title: Virgin Australia Lounge
description: Lounge is located in Domestic Terminal (T2) after Security near gate 37.

title: Wi-Fi
description:
Free Wi-Fi is available in all Sydney Airport terminals. The internet service is available for up to 2 hours and may be accessed by logging into the (Free Internet by Sponsors Name & SYD) network. The Wi-Fi service is not encrypted and security measures should be taken by the user.
Internet kiosks are also located both pre- and post-security at these terminals. Mobile telephone rental is available from Optus and Vodafone in the arrivals area of Terminal 1; an additional Vodafone outlet is located in Terminal 2.
